attributes.action: Separate Teams for England, Scotland, Wales at Rio Olympics
attributes.additional_details: When Hoy won gold in cycling his parents waved a sign with the Scottish flag, when Jones won gold in taekwondo she paraded a Welsh flag. None of the  English competitors waved St George flags. Only the English truly support Team GB. It's time for us to have separate teams in the Olympics. England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland should have their own Olympic Teams at Rio in 2016.
